surface_aggregation._comment: Set to true to combine indoor + outdoor hardcourt into 'Hard' (larger sample sizes). Set to false to keep them separate (more specific but smaller samples).
surface_aggregation._recommendation: true (default) - Better for data quality filtering

_examples.enabled: Player with 10 indoor + 20 outdoor = 30 total 'Hard' matches
_examples.disabled: Player with 10 indoor and 20 outdoor kept separate

multi_year_stats._comment: Set enable_three_year_stats to true for 2023-2024-2025 data, false for 2024-2025 only. min_years_required determines how many years of data are needed (1, 2, or 3).

surface_data_quality_filter._comment: Universal surface data quality filter settings. Matches are skipped if either player doesn't meet these thresholds.

_description.min_confidence: Minimum confidence level (0.50 = 50%) based on sample size
_description.min_matches_per_player: Minimum total matches on the surface across all years
_description.max_current_year_weight: Maximum weight from current year alone (0.80 = 80%)

_instructions.how_to_apply: Changes to this file require restarting the application or calling prediction_config functions
